document.full_text: irobot corp has won a contract valued at up to $230 million to deliver portable robotic systems used by u.s. troops to find and dispose of explosives and carry out reconnaissance, the pentagon said on tuesday.
document.title: irobot wins navy contract worth up to $230 million
lines_and_colors: irobot corp has won a contract valued at up to $230 million to deliver portable robotic systems used by u.s. troops to find and dispose of explosives and carry out reconnaissance, the pentagon said on tuesday.
